As you know, I had a great experience last month giving a helping hand forto the band called RAMONES.
It was a breeze to help them and was very cool as well,; those guys really know how to play rock.
I had onlyonly had to stay behind the drummer supplingsupplying them with water whenever they wanted.

I had a really nice time with them even toughtthough I would've preferedpreferred to stay at the front with the othersother people, but anyway it was a great experience for me, I holphope to be able to help them next year.
